String.name: Self-Destruct
String.tooltip: Self-destruct to damage nearby targets.

String.name: Arrow I
String.tooltip:
Shoot an arrow at a target up to $maxDistance away. Each successful hit generates 1 stack of Focus. (Stack Focus 10 times to reduce the charging time of Penetrating Arrow and Radiant Arrow.)
$H_S_GOODPvP:$COLOR_END Deals reduced damage at max distance.

String.name: Combo Attack I
String.tooltip: Strike one or more targets in front of you, and gain MP with each hit.$BRDecreases cooldowns for Decoy Jutsu, Double Cut, Skyfall, Circle of Steel, and One Thousand Cuts by 0.5 seconds with each hit.$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font> The first hit of Combo Attack staggers an enemy player.

String.name: Combo Attack I
String.tooltip: Strike one or more targets in front of you, and gain MP with each hit. Successive strikes do more damage, up to four hits, with the fourth hit dealing substantially more.

String.name: Sharan Bolt I
String.tooltip:
Unleash a bolt of Sharan energy at a single target up to $maxDistance away.
$H_S_GOODPVP:$COLOR_END Reduced damage at max distance.

String.name: Blast I
String.tooltip: Fire a shot which explodes on impact or up to $maxDistance away.

String.name: Punch I
String.tooltip: Throw a punch, replenishing your MP and increasing your Rage.

String.name: Combo Attack I
String.tooltip: Strike one or more targets in front of you, and gain MP with each hit. Successive strikes do more damage, up to three hits, with the third hit dealing substantially more.

String.name: Divine Radiance I
String.tooltip: Project a pulse of energy at an enemy up to $maxDistance away.

String.name: Combo Attack I
String.tooltip: Strike one or more targets in front of you, and gain MP with each hit. Successive strikes do more damage, up to four hits, with the fourth hit dealing substantially more.

String.name: Fireball I
String.tooltip:
Shoot a fireball at one target within $maxDistance.
$H_S_GOODPVP:$COLOR_END Reduced damage at max distance.

String.name: Spiral Barrage I
String.tooltip: Strike one or more targets at melee and mid range, and gain MP with each hit.

String.name: Combo Attack I
String.tooltip: Strike one or more targets in front of you, and gain MP with each hit. Successive strikes do more damage, up to four hits, with the fourth hit dealing substantially more.

String.name: Punch XI
String.tooltip: Throw a punch, replenishing your MP and increasing your Rage.

String.name: Punch XI
String.tooltip: Throw a punch, replenishing your MP and increasing your Rage.

String.name: Punch XI
String.tooltip: Throw a punch, replenishing your MP and increasing your Rage.

String.name: Arrow XII
String.tooltip:
Shoot an arrow at a target up to $maxDistance away. Each successful hit generates 1 stack of Focus. (Stack Focus 10 times to reduce the charging time of Penetrating Arrow and Radiant Arrow.)
$H_S_GOODPvP:$COLOR_END Deals reduced damage at max distance.

String.name: Combo Attack XII
String.tooltip: Strike one or more targets in front of you, and gain MP with each hit.$BRDecreases cooldowns for Decoy Jutsu, Double Cut, Skyfall, Circle of Steel, and One Thousand Cuts by 0.5 seconds with each hit.$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font> The first hit of Combo Attack staggers an enemy player.

String.name: Combo Attack XII
String.tooltip: Strike one or more targets in front of you, and gain MP with each hit. Successive strikes do more damage, up to four hits, with the fourth hit dealing substantially more.

String.name: Sharan Bolt XII
String.tooltip:
Unleash a bolt of Sharan energy at a single target up to $maxDistance away.
$H_S_GOODPVP:$COLOR_END Reduced damage at max distance.

String.name: Blast XII
String.tooltip: Fire a shot which explodes on impact or up to $maxDistance away.

String.name: Punch XII
String.tooltip: Throw a punch, replenishing your MP and increasing your Rage.

String.name: Combo Attack XII
String.tooltip: Strike one or more targets in front of you, and gain MP with each hit. Successive strikes do more damage, up to four hits, with the fourth hit dealing substantially more.

String.name: Divine Radiance XII
String.tooltip: Project a pulse of energy at an enemy up to $maxDistance away.

String.name: Combo Attack XII
String.tooltip: Strike one or more targets in front of you, and gain MP with each hit. Successive strikes do more damage, up to four hits, with the fourth hit dealing substantially more.

String.name: Fireball XII
String.tooltip:
Shoot a fireball at one target within $maxDistance.
$H_S_GOODPVP:$COLOR_END Reduced damage at max distance.

String.name: Combo Attack XII
String.tooltip: Strike one or more targets in front of you, and gain MP with each hit. Successive strikes do more damage, up to four hits, with the fourth hit dealing substantially more.

String.name: Punch XII
String.tooltip: Throw a punch, replenishing your MP and increasing your Rage.

String.name: Punch XII
String.tooltip: Throw a punch, replenishing your MP and increasing your Rage.

String.name: Punch XII
String.tooltip: Throw a punch, replenishing your MP and increasing your Rage.

String.name: Arrow Volley I
String.tooltip: Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Shadow Jump
String.tooltip: Instantly leap forward to evade enemy attacks. You can Shadow Jump twice within 3 seconds, and you can change direction between leaps.

String.name: Axe Block
String.tooltip: Block frontal attacks with your weapon. Damage blocked depends on your weapon's stats. Remains active as long as you hold down the skill button.

String.name: Corruption Ring I
String.tooltip: Drain HP from targets within 6m, storing it as spiritual energy. The HP absorbed is proportional to how long you channel the ring. Use the Infusion Ring skill to release the stored energy. Immune to knockdown, stun, and stagger while casting.

String.name: Bombardment I
String.tooltip: Press the skill button once to target an area within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again to launch a volley of eleven shots with a high chance of stagger. Gain 100 Willpower for each successful hit.

String.name: Counter I
String.tooltip: Block frontal enemy attacks, or follow Punch for some amazing combos (with frontal defense effect):$BR- After 1 Punch: staggers enemies$BR- After 2 Punches: knocks enemies into the air$BR- After 3 Punches: pulls monsters toward you$BR- After 4 Punches: knocks down enemies$BR$BRCorrect timing leads to Perfect Defense, which immediately deals one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BRHold the skill button to maintain a defensive posture, ready to block incoming damage. Consumes MP while held.$BR$BRPvP: Frontal defense effect does not apply when used as part of a combo.

String.name: Stand Fast I
String.tooltip: Block frontal attacks with your shield. Damage reduction depends on your equipment. Reduces damage as long as you hold down the skill button. Allies behind you also get damage reduction.

String.name: Regeneration Circle I
String.tooltip: Up to $maxCount allies within $maxDistance of you heal $value HP every $tickInterval for $time (modified by your heal bonus).

String.name: Knockdown Strike I
String.tooltip: Bowl your enemy over with a mighty swing of your sword. Activates faster if used after the last hit of Distant Blade.

String.name: Frost Sphere I
String.tooltip: Launches a damaging sphere of chilled air through a line of targets up to $maxDistance, which has a chance to briefly slow the target's Movement Speed by $value. Once the sphere reaches maximum range it shatters, damaging all nearby enemies.

String.name: Evasive Roll
String.tooltip: Dodge your enemy's attack.

String.name: Counter I
String.tooltip: Block frontal enemy attacks, or follow Punch for some amazing combos (with frontal defense effect):$BR- After 1 Punch: staggers enemies$BR- After 2 Punches: knocks enemies into the air$BR- After 3 Punches: pulls monsters toward you$BR- After 4 Punches: knocks down enemies$BR$BRCorrect timing leads to Perfect Defense, which immediately deals one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BRHold the skill button to maintain a defensive posture, ready to block incoming damage. Consumes MP while held.$BR$BRPvP: Frontal defense effect does not apply when used as part of a combo.

String.name: Arrow Volley I
String.tooltip: Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Infusion Ring I
String.tooltip: Release stored spiritual energy as MP to $maxCount group members within $maxDistance. Immune to knockdown, stun, and stagger while casting.

String.name: Arrow Volley II
String.tooltip: Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Axe Block II
String.tooltip: Block frontal attacks with your weapon. Damage blocked depends on your weapon's stats. Remains active as long as you hold down the skill button.$BR$H_S_BAD[Intimidation]$COLOR_END When Intimidation is active, the amount of damage blocked increases by 60%, and allies behind you are also protected. MP cost for skill is reduced to 0.

Consumes MP while held.$BR$BRPvP: Frontal defense effect does not apply when used as part of a combo.

String.name: Arrow Volley VI
String.tooltip: Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Infusion Ring VI
String.tooltip: Release stored spiritual energy as MP to $maxCount group members within $maxDistance. Immune to knockdown, stun, and stagger while casting.

String.name: Arrow Volley VII
String.tooltip: Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Corruption Ring VII
String.tooltip: Drain HP from targets within 6m, storing it as spiritual energy. The HP absorbed is proportional to how long you channel the ring. Use the Infusion Ring skill to release the stored energy as MP to up to 20 group members within 16m. Immune to knockdown, stun, and stagger while casting.

String.name: Bombardment VII
String.tooltip: Press the skill button once to target an area within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again to launch a volley of eleven shots with a high chance of stagger. Gain 100 Willpower for each successful hit.

String.tooltip: Block frontal enemy attacks, or follow Punch for some amazing combos (with frontal defense effect):$BR- After 1 Punch: staggers enemies$BR- After 2 Punches: knocks enemies into the air$BR- After 3 Punches: pulls monsters toward you$BR- After 4 Punches: knocks down enemies$BR$BRCorrect timing leads to Perfect Defense, which immediately deals one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.$BR$BRHold the skill button to maintain a defensive posture, ready to block incoming damage. String.name: Regeneration Circle VII
String.tooltip: Up to $maxCount allies within $maxDistance of you heal $value HP every $tickInterval for $time (modified by your heal bonus).

String.name: Knockdown Strike VII
String.tooltip: Bowl your enemy over with a mighty swing of your sword. Activates faster if used after the last hit of Distant Blade.

String.name: Frost Sphere VII
String.tooltip: Launches a damaging sphere of chilled air through a line of targets up to $maxDistance, which has a chance to briefly slow the target's Movement Speed by $value. Once the sphere reaches maximum range it shatters, damaging all nearby enemies.

String.name: Radiant Arrow I
String.tooltip:
Charge up the arrow's damage by holding down the skill button, then shoot the arrow up to $maxDistance by releasing the button. Only charges to one level.
$H_S_GOODPVP:$COLOR_END Reduced damage at max distance.

String.name: Leaves on the Wind I
String.tooltip: Throw eight iron spikes, damaging enemies in a cone within 18m. Deals crit damage to enemies suspended in air.

String.name: Thunder Strike I
String.tooltip: Charge up your axe by holding down the skill button, then release it to attack. Only charges to one level.

String.name: Titanic Wrath I
String.tooltip: Energy pours into you and non-hostile players within $maxDistance, increasing Power by $value for $time and Attack Speed by $value2.

String.name: Scattershot I
String.tooltip: Fire a spread of five penetrating shots at enemies within $maxDistance. Gain 20 Willpower for each successful hit, up to a maximum of 100 Willpower.

String.name: Divine Wrath I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#ff0030'>Rage Skill</font>$BR Call up on the fury of the gods to leap into the air and smite a group of enemies, with a high chance of knockdown and a high chance to crit. Also blocks attacks from the front.$BR$BRWhen your Rage is full, press the skill button once to activate, select your target area, then press the skill button again to execute.

String.name: Onslaught I
String.tooltip: Rush your foe and lunge repeatedly. You take only half damage while using this skill, and are more resistant to knockdown and stagger. Activates faster if you first use Shield Bash.

String.name: Healing Circle I
String.tooltip: Heal $hpDiff HP for up to $maxCount nearby group members other than you (modified by your heal bonus).

String.name: Whirlwind I
String.tooltip: Spin with your sword, hitting targets within $maxDistance.

String.name: Lightning Trap I
String.tooltip: Set a ring-shaped trap that briefly stuns its victims. Trap lasts 10 seconds or until triggered.

String.name: Double Shear I
String.tooltip: Fling your scythes to strike a ranged target. The scythes strike the target again as they return to you. Damage is increased by 10% when used in a chain with Spiral Barrage (after 3rd, 4th, or 5th hit), Grim Strike, Pendulum Strike, Whipsaw, Death Spiral, Smite, or Shadow Lash.

String.name: Torrent of Blows I
String.tooltip: Swing your swords in a wide arc, drawing high aggro from surrounding enemies. You take only half damage while using this skill, and are more resistant to knockdown and stagger. Adds frontal defense effect.$BR$H_S_GOOD[PvP]$COLOR_ENDDoes less damage to enemy players.

String.name: Radiant Arrow II
String.tooltip:
Charge up the arrow's damage by holding down the skill button, then shoot the arrow up to $maxDistance by releasing the button. Only charges to two levels.
$H_S_GOODPVP:$COLOR_END Reduced damage at max distance.

String.name: Leaves on the Wind II
String.tooltip: Throw eight iron spikes, damaging enemies in a cone within 18m. Deals crit damage to enemies suspended in air.

String.name: Thunder Strike II
String.tooltip: Charge up your axe by holding down the skill button, then release it to attack. Only charges to two levels.

String.name: Titanic Wrath II
String.tooltip: Energy pours into you and non-hostile players within $maxDistance, increasing Power by $value for $time and Attack Speed by $value2.

String.name: Scattershot II
String.tooltip: Fire a spread of five penetrating shots at enemies within $maxDistance. Gain 20 Willpower for each successful hit, up to a maximum of 100 Willpower.

String.name: Divine Wrath II
String.tooltip: <font color = '#ff0030'>Rage Skill</font>$BR Call up on the fury of the gods to leap into the air and smite a group of enemies, with a high chance of knockdown and a high chance to crit. Also blocks attacks from the front.$BR$BRWhen your Rage is full, press the skill button once to activate, select your target area, then press the skill button again to execute.

String.name: Onslaught II
String.tooltip: Rush your foe and lunge repeatedly. You take only half damage while using this skill, and are more resistant to knockdown and stagger. Activates faster if you first use Shield Bash.

String.name: Healing Circle II
String.tooltip: Heal $hpDiff HP for up to $maxCount nearby group members other than you (modified by your heal bonus).

String.name: Whirlwind II
String.tooltip: Spin with your sword, hitting targets within $maxDistance.

String.name: Lightning Trap II
String.tooltip: Set a ring-shaped trap that briefly stuns its victims. Trap lasts 10 seconds or until triggered.

String.name: Double Shear II
String.tooltip: Fling your scythes to strike a ranged target. The scythes strike the target again as they return to you. Damage is increased by 10% when used in a chain with Spiral Barrage (after 3rd, 4th, or 5th hit), Grim Strike, Pendulum Strike, Whipsaw, Death Spiral, Smite, or Shadow Lash.

String.name: Torrent of Blows II
String.tooltip: Swing your swords in a wide arc, drawing high aggro from surrounding enemies. You take only half damage while using this skill, and are more resistant to knockdown and stagger. Adds frontal defense effect.$BR$H_S_GOOD[PvP]$COLOR_ENDDoes less damage to enemy players.

String.name: Penetrating Arrow I
String.tooltip:
Charge up the arrow's damage by holding down the skill button, then shoot the arrow at up to $pierceDepth targets in a $maxDistance line by releasing the button. Arrow shoots when you release the button. Only charges to one level.
$H_S_GOODPVP:$COLOR_END Reduced damage at max distance.

String.name: Jagged Path I
String.tooltip: Dash forward up to 18m in a serpentine fashion, attacking and staggering the first enemy you encounter.

String.name: Flatten I
String.tooltip: Pound the ground, knocking down targets within $maxDistance.

String.name: Ancient Binding I
String.tooltip: Hurl a magical bolt forward $maxDistance, briefly slowing the target by $value.

String.name: Point Blank I
String.tooltip: Swing your arcannon to attack enemies within $maxDistance. Press the skill button again to fire a second shot which moves you back.

String.name: Ground Pounder I
String.tooltip: Pound the ground at your feet to pull the enemies closer, then knock them into the air, increasing your Rage. Blocks attacks from the front.$BR$BRCorrect timing leads to Perfect Defense, which immediately deals one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.

String.name: Challenging Shout I
String.tooltip: Draws aggro from monsters within $maxDistance and maintains it at maximum for 5 sec. Gains Unwavering for 20 sec.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Unwavering] </font>You are immune to push-back from monsters, except for certain special attacks.

String.name: Evasive Roll
String.tooltip: Dodge your enemy's attack.

String.name: Arcane Pulse I
String.tooltip: Launch a slow-moving pulse at enemies in front of you. Charge up the pulse's damage by holding down the skill button, then release the button to hit targets in a $maxDistance line. Launches 2 pulses when fully charged.

String.name: Sundering Strike I
String.tooltip: Gather shadows into your scythes to deal a fatal blow to a target in front of you. Sundering Strike inflicts more damage to enemies with lower HP. Shadows at the epicenter of the attack explode after 3 seconds to deal additional damage. Sundering Strike activates faster and inflicts more damage if used after Death Spiral, Double Shear, or Grim Strike.

String.name: Rain of Blows I
String.tooltip: Execute a flurry of sword swings while advancing on your foe. You take 30% less damage while using this skill, and are more resistant to knockdown and stagger. Activates faster if used after Combative Strike, Pounce or Cascade of Stuns.

String.tooltip: Pound the ground at your feet to pull the enemies closer, then knock them into the air, increasing your Rage. Blocks attacks from the front.$BR$BRCorrect timing leads to Perfect Defense, which immediately deals one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.

String.name: Challenging Shout VII
String.tooltip: Draws aggro from monsters within $maxDistance and maintains it at maximum for 5 sec. Gains Unwavering for 20 sec.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Unwavering] </font>You are immune to push-back from monsters, except for certain special attacks.

String.name: Arcane Pulse VII
String.tooltip: Launch a slow-moving pulse at enemies in front of you. Charge up the pulse's damage by holding down the skill button, then release the button to hit targets in a $maxDistance line. Launches 2 pulses when fully charged.

String.name: Rain of Blows VII
String.tooltip: Execute a flurry of sword swings while advancing on your foe. You take 30% less damage while using this skill, and are more resistant to knockdown and stagger. Activates faster if used after Combative Strike, Pounce or Cascade of Stuns.

String.name: Penetrating Arrow VIII
String.tooltip:
Charge up the arrow's damage by holding down the skill button, then shoot the arrow at up to $pierceDepth targets in a $maxDistance line by releasing the button. Arrow shoots when you release the button. Charges to three levels. Overcharging beyond the third-level charge will damage you. While charging up, you can move at half speed.
$H_S_GOODPVP:$COLOR_END Reduced damage at max distance.

String.name: Jagged Path VIII
String.tooltip: Dash forward up to 18m in a serpentine fashion, attacking and staggering the first enemy you encounter.

String.name: Flatten VIII
String.tooltip: Pound the ground, knocking down targets within $maxDistance. This skill activates faster when following Staggering Strike.

String.name: Rain of Arrows I
String.tooltip: Shoot arrows into the sky; they descend $offsetDistance away and damage targets in the circle where they land.

String.name: Impact Bomb I
String.tooltip: Toss a flame bomb at your feet and jump back, damaging your enemies and suspending them in the air.

String.name: Dash I
String.tooltip: Increase your speed by $value for $time.

String.name: Titanic Favor I
String.tooltip: Immediately heal up to $maxCount allies for $hpDiff HP. Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on up to $maxCount group members within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again or left-click to heal all targets.

String.name: Burst Fire I
String.tooltip: Fire a penetrating shot affecting up to three enemies in a line up to $maxDistance away. Holding down the skill button continues firing as long as you have Willpower. Each successive shot has increased skill damage and chance to crit. Enemies hit are slowed (no effect on bosses).

String.name: Bull Rush I
String.tooltip: Charge forward, driving back enemies in your path, generating aggro. Use your mouse to adjust your course in mid-charge. Enemy player can use evasion type skills while being pushed.

String.name: Shield Bash
String.tooltip: Briefly stun one or more foes.

String.name: Blessing of Shakan I
String.tooltip: You and your group members within $maxDistance receive a blessing that increases non-combat Movement Speed by 10 for $time.

String.name: Dash I
String.tooltip: Increase your speed by $value for $time.

String.name: Mana Infusion I
String.tooltip: Replenishes 400 MP every second, up to a maximum 2,000 MP.

String.name: Grim Strike I
String.tooltip: Fling your scythes to strike a target in front of you. Grim Strike activates faster when chained with Spiral Barrage (after 3rd, 4th, or 5th hit), Double Shear, Pendulum Strike, Whipsaw, Death Spiral, Smite, or Shadow Lash.

String.name: Battle Cry I
String.tooltip: Your warlike shout has a chance to stun enemies within $maxDistance. Against monsters, it also draws aggro and maintains it at maximum for 5 sec.

String.name: Backstep
String.tooltip: Quickly leap out of harm's way.

String.name: One Thousand Cuts I
String.tooltip: Charge forward and execute a lightning-fast series of attacks that damage and stagger enemies. You are immune to damage while attacking.

String.name: Staggering Strike I
String.tooltip: Make a sweeping attack that briefly stuns and turns your target around.

String.name: Shara's Lash
String.tooltip: Cast a bolt of Sharan energy forward $maxDistance that explodes at range or on contact, briefly stunning foes.

String.name: Time Bomb I
String.tooltip: Fire a shot that explodes on impact or up to $maxDistance away, leaving behind a Time Bomb that detonates two seconds later. Enemies near a Time Bomb are slowed, and the secondary detonation blasts any surviving enemies into the air. Gain 20 Willpower on a successful hit, and 40 Willpower from the secondary detonation. The Time Bomb does not lift bosses or elite monsters.

String.name: Haymaker I
String.tooltip: Wind up and throw a terrific punch, with a high chance of knocking the enemy down. This skill increases your Rage. (You deal more damage when the enemy's HP is lower.)

String.name: Arise I
String.tooltip: Instantly stands group members up to $maxDistance away and increases Balance Factor by $value for $time.

String.name: Backstab I
String.tooltip: Rush $maxDistance and make a lethal thrust to your target's back. The target is immobilized. Ends if target is knocked down.

String.name: Meteor Strike I
String.tooltip: Summons a flaming meteor and bombards targets in a $maxRadius radius circle centered $offsetDistance in front of you.

String.name: Death Spiral I
String.tooltip: Spin your scythes in a 720 degree arc, dealing damage to all enemies around you, and reducing the Movement Speed of all monsters hit for 5 seconds. You can use Death Spiral in a chain to interrupt your own skill actions. You can Spiral twice within 6 seconds, but a cooldown time triggers after the second Spiral or 6 seconds after the first.

String.tooltip: Charge forward and execute a lightning-fast series of attacks that damage and stagger enemies. You are immune to damage while attacking.

String.name: Staggering Strike III
String.tooltip: Make a sweeping attack that briefly stuns and turns your target around.

String.name: Time Bomb III
String.tooltip: Fire a shot that explodes on impact or up to $maxDistance away, leaving behind a Time Bomb that detonates two seconds later. Enemies near a Time Bomb are slowed, and the secondary detonation blasts any surviving enemies into the air. Gain 20 Willpower on a successful hit, and 40 Willpower from the secondary detonation. The Time Bomb does not lift bosses or elite monsters.

String.name: Haymaker III
String.tooltip: Wind up and throw a terrific punch, with a high chance of knocking the enemy down. A successful hit increases your Rage. (You deal more damage when the enemy's HP is lower.)

String.name: Meteor Strike III
String.tooltip: Summons a flaming meteor and bombards targets in a $maxRadius radius circle centered $offsetDistance in front of you.

String.name: Feign Death I
String.tooltip: Deceive monsters by pretending to be dead. This resets all aggro on you. You can feign death for up to $time. Ends when you use a skill or take damage.

String.name: Decoy Jutsu I
String.tooltip: Teleport behind an enemy within 15m and attack.

String.name: Mocking Shout
String.tooltip: Your warlike shout has a chance of staggering enemies within $maxDistance. You become immune to knockdown and stagger for $time, while greatly increasing your resistance to weakening effects.

String.name: Mana Infusion
String.tooltip: You regain $value MP every $tickinterval for $time. Ends if you take damage or use a combat skill or item.

String.name: Arcane Barrage I
String.tooltip: Fire an energy pulse that damages all enemies in a line up to $maxDistance. Press the skill button again to detonate the pulse, damaging and knocking down enemies in a wide radius with a high chance to crit and gaining Willpower. If used within 40m of a summoned HB construct, the HB fires five Electric Bombs at the detonation point.

String.name: Roundhouse Kick I
String.tooltip: Kicks monsters up into the air, increasing your Rage. Staggers enemy players.

String.name: Guardian Shout I
String.tooltip: Creates an aura which increases Endurance by 91% and Power by 30% for you and group members within 40m. Lasts $time. Effect ends if you are knocked down.

String.name: Slumber I
String.tooltip: Cast narcoleptic energy at an enemy up to $maxDistance away, putting your target briefly to sleep.

String.name: Backstep
String.tooltip: Quickly back up out of harm's way.

String.name: Final Judgment I
String.tooltip: Throw your scythes at an enemy to deal a fatal blow. Final Judgment can attack enemies at long range.

String.name: Roundhouse Kick I
String.tooltip: Kicks monsters up into the air, increasing your Rage. Staggers enemy players.

String.tooltip: Throw your scythes at an enemy to deal a fatal blow. Final Judgment can attack enemies at long range.

String.name: Rapid Fire I
String.tooltip:
Hold down the skill button to quickly fire up to 7 arrows $maxDistance away. Each successful hit generates 1 stack of Focus. (Stack Focus 10 times to reduce the charging time of Penetrating Arrow and Radiant Arrow.)
$H_S_GOODPvP:$COLOR_END Deals reduced damage at max distance.

String.name: Fire Avalanche I
String.tooltip: Rise into the air, then dive forward to attack an enemy within 13m and knock it down. You may use this skill up to three consecutive times before a cooldown applies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Raining Fire]</font> Attacking again with Fire Avalanche deals more damage.

String.name: Fiery Rage I
String.tooltip: Increases your Power by $value and Crit Factor by 10%, but decreases your Endurance by $value2 for $time.

String.name: Metamorphic Blast I
String.tooltip: Project a cone of divine energy that damages nearby enemies. Activates faster after using Metamorphic Smite.

String.name: Piledriver I
String.tooltip: Deliver a series of uppercuts while leaping into the air—then end with a powerful downward blow. Successful hits increase your Rage.

String.name: Shield Counter I
String.tooltip: Gain a chance to shield-thump your foe while using the Stand Fast skill, with a high chance to crit. You take half damage while using the skill, and have a high resistance to knockdown and stagger.

String.name: Mana Infusion
String.tooltip: You regain $value MP every $tickinterval for $time. Ends if you take damage or use a combat skill or item.

String.name: Overhand Strike I
String.tooltip: Swing downward for a massive blow. Skill activates faster if you first use Whirlwind, Knockdown Strike, Leaping Strike, Stunning Backhand, Heart Thrust, Startling Kick, Eviscerate, Fury Strike, the last hit of Distant Blade, or the fourth consecutive hit with Combo Attack.

String.name: Flame Pillar I
String.tooltip: Summon a column of flame in front of you that burns enemies within $maxDistance.

String.name: Whipsaw I
String.tooltip: Fling your scythes at enemies within range to inflict multiple hits, recovering some of your own HP. In PvP, the effect of healing skills on enemy players is reduced when they are hit by the spinning scythes by 6% per hit (stacks up to 5). You can use Whipsaw to interrupt your own skill actions when used in a chain with Spiral Barrage, Double Shear, or Pendulum Strike.

String.name: Assault Stance I
String.tooltip: Increases Power by 5, Crit Factor by 30, and skill damage by 10% when attacking monsters. However, your Endurance decreases by 10% while in Assault Stance. You can use only one stance at a time.

String.name: Piledriver I
String.tooltip: Deliver a series of uppercuts while leaping into the air—then end with a powerful downward blow. Successful hits increase your Rage.

You can use Whipsaw to interrupt your own skill actions when used in a chain with Spiral Barrage, Double Shear, or Pendulum Strike.

String.name: Rapid Fire II
String.tooltip:
Hold down the skill button to quickly fire up to 7 arrows $maxDistance away. Each successful hit generates 1 stack of Focus. (Stack Focus 10 times to reduce the charging time of Penetrating Arrow and Radiant Arrow.)
$H_S_GOODPvP:$COLOR_END Deals reduced damage at max distance.

String.name: Fire Avalanche II
String.tooltip: Rise into the air, then dive forward to attack an enemy within 13m and knock it down. You may use this skill up to three consecutive times before a skill cooldown applies.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Raining Fire]</font> Attacking again with Fire Avalanche deals more damage.

String.name: Fiery Rage II
String.tooltip: Increases your Power by $value and Crit Factor by 10%, but decreases your Endurance by $value2 for $time.

String.name: Metamorphic Blast II
String.tooltip: Project a cone of divine energy that damages nearby enemies. Activates faster after using Metamorphic Smite.

String.name: Piledriver II
String.tooltip: Deliver a series of uppercuts while leaping into the air—then end with a powerful downward blow. Successful hits increase your Rage.

String.name: Shield Counter II
String.tooltip: Gain a chance to shield-thump your foe while using the Stand Fast skill, with a high chance to crit. You take half damage while using the skill, and have a high resistance to knockdown and stagger.

String.name: Overhand Strike II
String.tooltip: Swing downward for a massive blow. Skill activates faster if you first use Whirlwind, Knockdown Strike, Leaping Strike, Stunning Backhand, Heart Thrust, Startling Kick, Eviscerate, Fury Strike, the last hit of Distant Blade, or the fourth consecutive hit with Combo Attack.

String.name: Flame Pillar II
String.tooltip: Summon a column of flame in front of you that burns enemies within $maxDistance.

String.name: Slow Trap I
String.tooltip: Set a trap that briefly slows the victim's Movement Speed by $value. The trap lasts for 15 seconds or until triggered.

String.name: Smoke Bomb
String.tooltip: Create a smoke cloud to evade enemy attacks. The cloud lasts for 3 seconds, and also affects allies.

String.name: Arun's Cleansing Touch
String.tooltip: Purge all harmful effects from your allies. Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on up to $maxCount group members within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again or left-click to purge all targets.

String.name: Mana Missiles I
String.tooltip: Launch a weaving pair of missiles up to $maxDistance. Each missile that strikes an enemy explodes, with a high chance of knockdown and generating 20 Willpower. Charging the skill creates three additional missiles.

String.name: Jackhammer I
String.tooltip: Hammer the enemy with a flurry of rapid jabs, increasing your Rage and decreasing enemy's Endurance by 1% per successful hit (up to 8% total).

String.name: Leash I
String.tooltip: Throw a magical hook and chain that pulls one enemy within $maxDistance toward you and stuns them for 3 seconds. Not effective on huge opponents.

String.name: Leaping Strike I
String.tooltip: Jump at your foe and smash downward. Knocked-down foes take 5x damage once you learn Merciless Leap.

String.name: Smite
String.tooltip: Jump into the air and strike enemies in the head with your scythes, stunning them 2.5 seconds.

String.tooltip: Increases Endurance by 25% and Balance Factor by 30. Attacks draw 120% more aggro, and you are immune to push-back from monsters, except for certain special attacks. You can use only one stance at a time.

String.name: Stunning Trap I
String.tooltip: Set a trap that briefly stuns the victim. The trap lasts for 20 seconds or until triggered.

String.name: Retaliate I
String.tooltip: Leap to your feet while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked-down. You become briefly immune to knockdown, stagger, and stuns.

String.name: Cyclone I
String.tooltip: Charge up your attack by holding down the skill button, then release it to spin your axe in a circle. Only charges to one level.

String.name: Resurrect
String.tooltip: When dead group members lie within $maxDistance, you can restore life to the nearest $MaxCount.

String.name: Arc Bomb I
String.tooltip: Lob a bomb up to $maxDistance, which can bounce up to three times before exploding. On striking an enemy, the bomb generates 20 Willpower and explodes, stunning nearby enemies.

String.name: Counterpunch I
String.tooltip: After a successful block, throw a counterpunch that knocks the enemy up into the air, increasing your Rage. Blocks attacks from the front.$BR$BRCorrect timing leads to Perfect Defense, which immediately deals one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.

String.name: Debilitate I
String.tooltip: Briefly weaken the Endurance of your foes by $value. Effect stacks up to three times.$BR$H_S_GOOD[PvP]$COLOR_END Also decreases your foe's HP recovery by 30% at any number of stacks.

String.name: Purifying Circle
String.tooltip: Instantly remove all harmful effects from up to $maxCount allies within $maxDistance.

String.name: Retaliate I
String.tooltip: Leap to your feet while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to knockdown, stagger, and stuns.

String.name: Mana Barrier I
String.tooltip: Cast a magical shield that absorbs up to $value damage for $time. Costs 1 MP per 14 damage the shield absorbs. Ends when the shield reaches maximum damage or you run out of MP.

String.name: Pendulum Strike I
String.tooltip: Swing your scythes upward in an arc to damage enemies in front of you as you jump backward. Monsters hit by Pendulum Strike are immobilized for 3 seconds. You can use Pendulum Strike in a chain to interrupt your own skill actions.

String.name: Death From Above I
String.tooltip: Become invincible while executing a surprise blow.

String.name: Poison Trap I
String.tooltip: Set a trap that damages the victim by $value each $tickInterval for $time. The trap lasts for 20 seconds or until triggered. Does less damage to other players.

String.name: Focus
String.tooltip: Infuse energy into your weapon to increase its damage by 5%. Focus drains 20 MP every second while active.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Intense Focus]</font> Gain an additional 1% damage increase for every five seconds you do not take damage. Intense Focus stacks up to ten times and ends if you are hit by an attack.

String.name: Leaping Strike I
String.tooltip: Jump at your foe and smash downward. Knocked-down foes take 5x damage once you learn Merciless Leap.

String.name: Summon: Party
String.tooltip: Teleport all group members within the same province to your side. You cannot teleport group members who are in other provinces.

String.name: Rocket Jump I
String.tooltip: Spin and fire at the ground, damaging nearby enemies and propelling yourself in whatever direction you are facing. Use during Rolling Reload for additional distance.

String.name: Retaliate I
String.tooltip: Leap to your feet while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to knockdown, stagger, and stuns.

String.name: Metamorphic Blast I
String.tooltip: Project a cone of divine energy that damages nearby enemies.

String.name: Lightning Strike I
String.tooltip: Calls down a 15m line of lightning bolts in front of you, damaging any opponents in its path.

String.name: Shadow Lash I
String.tooltip: Create a whip of shadows and fling it at targets in front of you. Shadow Lash can be chained together up to 4 times and replenishes MP on every hit. A cooldown time begins after the chain ends.

String.name: Velik's Mark I
String.tooltip: Mark a target within $maxDistance for $time. You deal 10% more damage to the marked target.

String.name: Skyfall I
String.tooltip: Jump into the air and attack nearby enemies.

String.name: Unchained Anger I
String.tooltip: Sacrifice HP to gain $mpDiff MP.

String.name: Vow of Rebirth
String.tooltip: Form a pact between you and a group member, who will resurrect if killed in the next $time. Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on a group member within 18m, then press the skill button again or left-click to form a pact with the target.

String.name: Retaliate I
String.tooltip: Leap to your feet while attacking your target, increasing your Rage. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to knockdown, stagger, and stuns.

String.name: Infuriate
String.tooltip: Enrages all monsters within $maxDistance and increases your aggro to the maximum amount.

String.name: Resurrect
String.tooltip: When dead group members lie within $maxDistance, you can restore life to the nearest $MaxCount.

String.name: Heart Thrust I
String.tooltip: Step forward, attacking your target's vulnerable spots.

String.name: Void Pulse I
String.tooltip: Launch a powerful sphere at a single target within $maxDistance.

String.name: Shadow Burst I
String.tooltip: Gather shadows into your scythes and strike the ground, damaging nearby targets. Press the skill button again to inflict additional damage with a high chance of pulling enemies toward you and to the ground. You are immune to knockdown and stagger while using Shadow Burst.

String.name: Leaping Strike I
String.tooltip: Jump at your foe and smash downward. Knocked-down foes take 5x damage once you learn Merciless Leap.

String.tooltip: Lob a bomb up to $maxDistance, which explodes on impact and creates a target for your HB construct. The HB throws five more bombs of equal strength at the same spot. Gain 10 Willpower for each successful hit. Only usable with a summoned HB construct within 40m.

String.tooltip: Gather shadows into your scythes and strike the ground, damaging nearby targets. Press the skill button again to inflict additional damage with a high chance of pulling enemies toward you and to the ground. You are immune to knockdown and stagger while using Shadow Burst.

String.name: Aura of the Merciless I
String.tooltip: Grants Titanic Wrath I to you and your allies within 30m. Costs $H_W_BAD30$COLOR_END MP every $H_W_BAD2$COLOR_END seconds to maintain. Cannot be used with Aura of the Swift.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Titanic Wrath I]</font> Increases Power by $H_W_GOOD20$COLOR_END. Increases Attack Speed by $H_W_GOOD6$COLOR_END.

String.name: Balder's Vengeance I
String.tooltip: Deal damage to all enemies in front of you, up to $maxDistance, with a very high chance to crit. You are invulnerable while using this skill.

String.name: Provoke I
String.tooltip: Draw the attention of enemies within 10m, increasing their aggro toward you. Can be used while moving.

String.name: Spring Attack I
String.tooltip: Leap to your foe and strike a hard blow. Activates faster if you first use Shield Bash, Shield Barrage, Debilitate, Shield Counter, or the third consecutive hit of Combo Attack.

String.name: Homeward Bound
String.tooltip: Teleport yourself and group members within 20m to the nearest campfire.

String.name: Stunning Backhand I
String.tooltip: Swing your sword around, briefly stunning your foe.

String.name: Mindblast I
String.tooltip: Briefly put targets to sleep in a $maxRadius radius centered $offsetDistance in front of you.

String.name: Soul Reversal
String.tooltip: Throw a shadowy cable at a single target within 20m. A successful hit entangles the target, and deals damage over time. Press the skill button again to switch places with the target (if within 40m) and stun them. If the entangled target is a boss or elite monster, you teleport behind the target instead of switching places.

String.name: Incendiary Trap I
String.tooltip: Set a trap that damages the victim that steps on it and others nearby. The trap lasts for 12 seconds or until triggered.

String.name: Burning Heart I
String.tooltip: Tap your inner strength to produce a penetrating volley of fireballs. Fireballs stagger and deal double damage to normal monsters and minions, and automatically crit targets suspended in the air. Holding down the skill button launches fireballs as long as you have Chi (up to a maximum of ten fireballs), but Burning Heart's cooldown increases by 2 seconds for each fireball.

String.name: Vampiric Blow I
String.tooltip: Charge up your axe by holding down the skill button, then release it to attack. On a successful hit, a portion of the damage dealt returns to you as healing. Only charges to one level. Overcharging Thunder Strike, Cyclone, or Lethal Strike triggers a high damage, low healing Vampiric Blow. In both cases, the lower your HP, the more damage you will deal.

String.name: Aura of the Unyielding I
String.tooltip: Increases the Crit Resist Factor of group members within 30m by 10%. Costs $H_W_BAD30$COLOR_END MP every $H_W_BAD2$COLOR_END seconds to maintain. Cannot be used with Aura of the Tenacious.

String.name: Replenishment I
String.tooltip: Replenish 300 MP and 100 Willpower. May eliminate cooldowns for Scattershot and Arcane Barrage (50% chance for each).

String.name: High Kick I
String.tooltip: Kick a knocked-down enemy up in the air, increasing your Rage. Activates when you knock down an enemy.

String.name: Charging Lunge I
String.tooltip: Charge a short distance and impale your target.

String.name: Blessing of Zenobia
String.tooltip: Boost the non-combat speed of you and your allies within $maxDistance by $value for $time.

String.name: Startling Kick I
String.tooltip: Briefly stun your target with a kick, then leap backward.

String.name: Retribution I
String.tooltip: Prepare to counter an incoming attack. If you activate Retribution right before an attack lands, you ignore all damage and immediately charge toward the enemy. While preparing, you also ignore all damage and become immune to all effects. Attack speed does not affect the Retribution skill.

String.name: Retribution I
String.tooltip: Prepare to counter an incoming attack. If you activate Retribution right before an attack lands, you ignore all damage and immediately charge toward the enemy. While preparing, you also ignore all damage and become immune to all effects. Attack speed does not affect the Retribution skill.

String.tooltip: Replenish 400 MP and 100 Willpower. May eliminate cooldowns for Scattershot and Arcane Barrage (50% chance for each).

String.name: High Kick V
String.tooltip: Kick a knocked-down enemy up in the air, increasing your Rage. Activates when you knock down an enemy.

String.name: Charging Lunge V
String.tooltip: Charge a short distance and impale your target.

String.name: Startling Kick V
String.tooltip: Briefly stun your target with a kick, then leap backward.

String.name: Incendiary Trap VI
String.tooltip: Set a trap that damages the victim that steps on it and others nearby. The trap lasts for 12 seconds or until triggered.

String.name: Burning Heart VI
String.tooltip: Tap your inner strength to produce a penetrating volley of fireballs. Fireballs stagger and deal double damage to normal monsters and minions, and automatically crit targets suspended in the air. Holding down the skill button launches fireballs as long as you have Chi (up to a maximum of ten fireballs), but Burning Heart's cooldown increases by 2 seconds for each fireball.

String.name: Vampiric Blow VI
String.tooltip: Charge up your axe by holding down the skill button, then release it to attack. On a successful hit, a portion of the damage dealt returns to you as healing. Only charges to one level. Overcharging Thunder Strike, Cyclone, or Lethal Strike triggers a high damage, low healing Vampiric Blow. In both cases, the lower your HP, the more damage you will deal.

String.name: Breakaway Bolt I
String.tooltip: Shoot an explosive arrow that damages targets within $maxDistance, while leaping out of harm's way.

String.name: Death Blossom I
String.tooltip: Toss a ring of shurikens that damages all enemies within 7m, then pulls them toward you and knocks them down.

String.name: Fearsome Shout I
String.tooltip: Monsters within $maxDistance briefly run away from you. Fear effect ends if target is knocked down. In PvP, Fear effect ends if target is attacked.

String.name: Aura of the Tenacious
String.tooltip: Replenishes 20 MP every second to other group members within 30m. Costs $H_W_BAD30$COLOR_END MP every $H_W_BAD2$COLOR_END seconds to maintain. Cannot be used with Aura of the Unyielding.

String.name: Flip Kick I
String.tooltip: Deliver a kick to the enemy's head, stunning the enemy for 3 seconds and increasing your Rage. When used on an enemy player who's knocked up in the air, the enemy player can't use Retaliate for 3 seconds.

String.name: Second Wind I
String.tooltip: Recovers $hpDiff HP and 750 RE.

String.name: Shocking Implosion I
String.tooltip: Produce an electrical burst $maxDistance in front of you.

String.name: Fury Strike I
String.tooltip: Slash your greatsword in front of you; the lower your HP, the greater the damage.$BR$H_S_GOOD[PvP]$COLOR_END Also reduces the effect of healing skills on foes by 30%.

String.name: Painblast I
String.tooltip: Up to $maxcount targets within a $maxRadius radius centered $offsetDistance in front of you take $value damage every $tickInterval for $time. Does less damage to other players.

String.name: Shadow Reaping
String.tooltip: Reap the shadows around you. While reaping, the cooldown time of Double Shear, Grim Strike, Pendulum Strike, Whipsaw, Sundering Strike, Cable Step, Death Spiral, Smite, and Retaliate are reduced by 70%.

String.name: Charging Slash I
String.tooltip: Charge forward and attack the first target in your path. Attack draws high aggro.

String.name: Web Arrow I
String.tooltip:
Shoot an arrow up to $maxDistance, inflicting damage and slowing the target's Movement Speed by $value for $time.
$H_S_GOODPVP:$COLOR_END Reduced damage at max distance.

String.name: Attunement
String.tooltip: Still your mind and restore your Chi by 50%.

String.name: Teleport Jaunt
String.tooltip: Teleport a short distance in the direction the camera faces.

String.name: Rampage I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#ff0030'>Rage Skill</font>$BRRush the enemy from up to 20m away and deliver a series of devastating blows.$BRKnocks monsters into the air (does not affect other players) and blocks attacks from the front.$BR$BRCorrect timing leads to Perfect Defense, which immediately deals one critical hit to the enemy (if within 8m) and generates an additional 200 Rage.

String.name: Adrenaline Rush I
String.tooltip: Increases Attack Speed by 15% and increases damage to monsters by 5% for you and all party members within 40m for $time.

String.name: Prayer of Peace I
String.tooltip: Nullify your aggro from nearby enemies.

String.name: Headlong Rush I
String.tooltip: Charge forward, increasing the speed of your next attack within 10 seconds by 30%. Effect ends after 10 seconds or when you hit a target.

String.name: Painful Trap I
String.tooltip: Set a trap that explodes when stepped on. Trap lasts 10 seconds.

String.name: Spirit Gallows
String.tooltip: Hold and charge the skill button to levitate surrounding enemies. The longer you hold the charge, the higher your enemies will rise and the more damage they will take when they fall. Levitated enemies cannot be damaged by normal attacks until dropped, and will fall immediately if you are immobilized.

String.name: Vortex Slash I
String.tooltip: Swing your swords in a wide arc. You can use it as a chain skill only after Evasive Roll or Death From Above.

String.name: Close Quarters I
String.tooltip: Strike a foe in front of you. Press the skill button twice to make a second attack that may stun the foe.

String.name: Bladestorm I
String.tooltip: Throw your shuriken up to 12m ahead of you, where it will pull in and damage nearby enemies for 2.5 seconds (slightly less in PvP).

String.name: Lethal Strike I
String.tooltip: Charge up your attack by holding down the skill button, then release it to attack. Costs HP to use, not MP. Only charges to one level. The lower your HP, the more damage you will deal.

String.name: Arun's Vitae I
String.tooltip: Gather Arunic power to create a mote that recovers 390 HP every second for 3 seconds and removes all harmful effects. Charge up the mote's range by holding down the skill button, then shoot the mote up to 18m by releasing the button. HP recovery effect can stack up to 2 times, which increases the recovery by 30%.

String.name: HB-1
String.tooltip: Summon a construct to aid you. HB-1 damages nearby enemies when summoned. When you are nearby and below max HP, HB-1 aims a healing ray at you. Command: Stay/Follow, Command: Recall, and Command: Self-Destruct work while HB-1 is active and within 40m. If you move more than 60m from HB-1, it will teleport to your side. Lasts up to 30 minutes.

String.name: Growing Fury
String.tooltip: <font color = '#ff0030'>Rage Skill</font>$BRRelease your Rage to gain the following effects:$BR - Increases Power and Crit Factor by 30.$BR - Draws 10% more aggro.$BR -Increase size and melee range by 10%.$BR - Reduces skill cooldown by 30%.$BR -Increase size and melee range by 10%.$BR -Blocks frontal attacks while casting.$BR -Adds frontal defense effect to all attack skills while active.$BR -Consumes 300 Rage per second. Effect ends when you run out of Rage.$BR -You cannot use Mounting Rage or Meat Grinder while this skill is in effect. If Mounting Rage is in effect, casting Growing Fury cancels Mounting Rage.$BR$BR - Reduces Attack Speed by 10.

String.name: Shield Barrage I
String.tooltip: Move forward, attacking target with your shield. Repeat the attack up to 2 hits, and the last hit may briefly stun your target.

String.name: Heal Thyself I
String.tooltip: Restore $hpDiff HP to yourself (modified by your heal bonus).

String.name: Overpower I
String.tooltip: Gather your might for a decisive blow. Your next attack within $time does $value extra damage.

String.name: Glacial Retreat I
String.tooltip: Freeze the ground before you as you leap backward, briefly decreasing the Movement Speed of your target by $value.

String.name: Shrouded Escape
String.tooltip: Cloak yourself in shadow, reducing aggro and becoming invisible. This effect lasts for 5 seconds maximum, and dispels on using a skill or being attacked.

String.name: Combative Strike I
String.tooltip: Sacrifice HP to deal a decisive attack, decreasing the Endurance of your foes by $value.$BR$H_S_GOOD[PvP]$COLOR_END Also reduces the effect of healing skills on foes by 30%.

String.tooltip: Freeze the ground before you as you leap backward, briefly decreasing the Movement Speed of your target by $value.

String.name: Combative Strike II
String.tooltip: Sacrifice HP to deal a decisive attack, decreasing the Endurance of your foes by $value.$BR$H_S_GOOD[PvP]$COLOR_END Also reduces the effect of healing skills on foes by 30%.

String.name: Close Quarters III
String.tooltip: Strike a foe in front of you. Press the skill button twice to make a second attack that may stun the foe.

String.name: Bladestorm III
String.tooltip: Throw your shuriken up to 12m ahead of you, where it will pull in and damage nearby enemies for 2.5 seconds (slightly less in PvP).

String.name: Lethal Strike III
String.tooltip: Charge up your attack by holding down the skill button, then release it to attack. Costs HP to use, not MP. Charges to two levels. While charging up, you can move at half speed. The lower your HP, the more damage you will deal.

String.name: Arun's Vitae III
String.tooltip: Gather Arunic power to create a mote that recovers 716 HP every second for 3 seconds and removes all harmful effects. Charge up the mote's range by holding down the skill button, then shoot the mote up to 18m by releasing the button. HP recovery effect can stack up to 2 times, which increases the recovery by 30%.

String.name: HB-3
String.tooltip: Summon a construct to aid you. HB-3 damages nearby enemies when summoned. When you are nearby and below max HP, HB-3 aims a healing ray at you. Command: Stay/Follow, Command: Recall, and Command: Self-Destruct work while HB-3 is active and within 40m. If you move more than 60m from HB-3, it will teleport to your side. Lasts up to 30 minutes.

String.name: Shield Barrage III
String.tooltip: Move forward, attacking target with your shield. Repeat the attack up to 2 hits, and the last hit may briefly stun your target.

String.name: Heal Thyself III
String.tooltip: Restore $hpDiff HP to yourself (modified by your heal bonus).

String.name: Anti-Tank Mine
String.tooltip: A high-damage trap. Stays active for 60 seconds.

String.name: Lightning Mine
String.tooltip: Temporarily immobilizes an enemy tank. Stays active for 60 seconds.

String.name: Thunder Mine
String.tooltip: Temporarily prevents an enemy tank from attacking. Stays active for 60 seconds.

String.name: Suicide Soldier
String.tooltip: Press the skill button once to activate a Suicide Bomb, then again to deal massive damage to nearby enemies. You cannot board a tank while this skill is active, and once you explode you will be a spectator until the end of the round.

String.name: Suicide Bomber
String.tooltip: Blow yourself up.

String.name: Poison Arrow I
String.tooltip:
Shoot an arrow dripping with lethal poison. The arrow flies $maxDistance, inflicting damage to the target and additionally inflicting $value damage every $tickInterval for $time. Can be stacked up to 3 times.
$H_S_GOODPVP:$COLOR_END Reduced damage at max distance.

String.name: Chakra Thrust I
String.tooltip: Lunge forward and stab a target at close range, stunning them for 3 seconds.

String.name: Tenacity I
String.tooltip: Call on inner reserves to instantly replenish $mpDiffMP. Greatly increases resistance to stun for 5 seconds. Stops MP decay for $time.

String.name: ST-1
String.tooltip: Summon a construct to aid you in combat. Throw ST-1 at a spot within $maxDistance, and it will continually attack enemies within 18m for 45 seconds. Command: Self-Destruct works while ST-1 is active.

String.name: Invigorating Rage
String.tooltip: <font color = '#ff0030'>Rage Skill</font>$BRBurn off half of your maximum Rage to recover 40% of your maximum HP and replenish 40% of your maximum MP.

String.name: Pledge of Protection
String.tooltip: Absorb 20% of damage done to other group members within 20m for $time by taking it on yourself and reduce 20% of damage you receive. Your Defense determines how much damage you take.

String.name: Focus Heal I
String.tooltip: Restore $hpDiff HP to $maxcount targeted group members within $maxDistance (modified by your heal bonus). Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on targets, then press the skill button again or left-click to heal all targets.

String.name: Tenacity I
String.tooltip: Call on inner reserves to instantly replenish $mpDiffMP. Increases resistance to stun for 5 seconds. Stops MP decay for $time.

String.name: Mana Siphon
String.tooltip: Charge up your attack by holding down the skill button, then release it to take MP from targets within $maxDistance. While charging up, you can move at full speed.

String.name: Rising Fury I
String.tooltip: Hit a target twice; the lower your HP, the greater the damage. Press the skill button a second time for another, even stronger hit.

String.tooltip: Restore $hpDiff HP to $maxcount targeted group members within $maxDistance (modified by your heal bonus). Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on targets, then press the skill button again or left-click to heal all targets.

String.name: Outlaw Declaration
String.tooltip: While toggled, you may attack other players and other players may attack you. (Note that outlaws may not attack players with Seren's Protection.) Killing other players 6 or more levels lower will stack infamy, which may result in penalties.

String.name: Murderous Intent
String.tooltip: Increases Power by $H_W_GOOD$value2$COLOR_END, Attack Speed by $H_W_GOOD$value3$COLOR_END, Crit Factor by $H_W_GOOD$value5$COLOR_END, and Movement Speed by $H_W_GOOD$value4$COLOR_END.

String.name: Dark Wings
String.tooltip: Increases Power by 3, Attack Speed by 2%, Crit Factor by 2 and Movement Speed by 4% for $time. <font color = '#FF0000'>You may use this skill until the next Crusade season begins.</font>

String.name: Dark Souls
String.tooltip: Increases Power by 3, Attack Speed by 2% and Movement Speed by 4% for $time. <font color = '#FF0000'>You may use this skill until the next Crusade season begins.</font>

String.name: Dark Hearts
String.tooltip: Increases Power by 3 and Movement Speed by 4% for $time. <font color = '#FF0000'>You may use this skill until the next Crusade season begins.</font>

String.name: Restraining Arrow I
String.tooltip:
Shoots an arrow up to $maxDistance, decreasing the target's Movement Speed by $value2 and Attack Speed by $value for a short time.
$H_S_GOODPVP:$COLOR_END Reduced damage at max distance.

String.name: Clone Jutsu
String.tooltip: Target another player within 30m and duplicate their current appearance. Clone Jutsu lasts for 60 seconds, and you can take no actions other than moving, jumping, climbing ladders, or using emotes. Your transformation ends if you use a skill or take damage from an enemy.

String.name: Inescapable Doom I
String.tooltip: Briefly slows movement of targets within $maxDistance radius by $value. Prevents other players from using evasive and movement skills.

String.name: Retaliate I
String.tooltip: Leap to your feet while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to knockdown, stagger, and stuns.

String.name: Meat Grinder I
String.tooltip: Target an enemy suspended in air and pummel it with a series of devastating blows, increasing your Rage.$BRWhen used on an enemy player, the enemy player cannot use evasion type skills for 3 seconds.

String.name: Menacing Wave
String.tooltip: Blast a wave that briefly decreases Movement Speed and Attack Speed of all targets within $maxDistance by $value.

String.name: Blessing of Seren I
String.tooltip: Increase the Endurance of up to $maxCount allies (including you) within $maxDistance by $value for $time.

String.name: In Cold Blood I
String.tooltip: Increases Power by $value for $time. Increases Attack Speed by $value2.

String.name: Flaming Barrage I
String.tooltip: Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Cable Step
String.tooltip: Throw your scythes on cables at a target within 18 meters. After hitting and stunning the target, you pull on the cables to fly toward the target.

String.name: Deadly Gamble I
String.tooltip: Increases the chance to crit by $value for $time.

String.name: Restraining Arrow II
String.tooltip:
Shoots an arrow up to $maxDistance, decreasing the target's Movement Speed by $value2 and Attack Speed by $value for a short time.
$H_S_GOODPVP:$COLOR_END Reduced damage at max distance.

String.name: Inescapable Doom II
String.tooltip: Briefly slows movement of targets within $maxDistance radius by $value. Prevents other players from using evasive and movement skills.

String.name: Retaliate II
String.tooltip: Leap to your feet while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to knockdown, stagger, and stuns.

String.name: Meat Grinder II
String.tooltip: Target an enemy suspended in air and pummel it with a series of devastating blows, increasing your Rage.$BRWhen used on an enemy player, the enemy player cannot use evasion type skills for 3 seconds.

String.name: Blessing of Seren II
String.tooltip: Increase the Endurance of up to $maxCount allies (including you) within $maxDistance by $value for $time.

String.name: In Cold Blood II
String.tooltip: Increases Power by $value and Attack Speed by $value2 for $time. Activates Ultimate Overhand Strike.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Ultimate Overhand Strike] </font>While $H_W_GOODIn Cold Blood II$COLOR_END is in effect, increases damage of Overhand Strike and resets its cooldown.

String.name: Sniper's Eye I
String.tooltip: Increases Power by 30, Attack Speed by 4, and Movement Speed by 8. Increases damage to monsters by 7%.

String.name: Bloodlust I
String.tooltip: Your Power increases by $value. Your Balance Factor and Impact Factor each increases by $value3. Activates Flurry of Blows I, increasing Attack Speed and charging speed by 20% for 10 seconds. Additionally, damage to monsters increases by $value2. Lasts $time.

String.name: Retaliate I
String.tooltip: Leap to your feet while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked-down. You become briefly immune to knockdown, stagger, and stuns.

String.name: Command: Recall I
String.tooltip: Travel in a straight line to your HB construct, passing through enemies without effect. You must be within 40m to use this skill. Can be used while knocked down or using another skill.

String.name: Mounting Rage
String.tooltip: Immediately gain 50% of your maximum Rage, then gain 50 more Rage every second for 20 seconds.$BRYou cannot use this skill while Growing Fury is in effect.

String.name: Lockdown Blow I
String.tooltip: Deliver a crippling attack in front of you, briefly decreasing the target's Movement Speed by $value.

String.name: Blessing of Arachne
String.tooltip: Increase all resistances for you and your allies within $maxDistance by $value for $time.

String.name: Exhausting Blow
String.tooltip: Strike a painful blow that increases target's cooldown time by 50% for all skills they use in the next 11 seconds. Effective only on other players.

String.name: Nerve Exhaustion
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[PvP]</font> Weaken up to $maxCount players within $maxDistance and prevent them from using any skills for 5 seconds. Knockdown or an attack on a target ends the effect. Click the skill button once and mouse over to lock on targets, then click the skill button again or left-click to shoot at all targets. Using this skill on a target cursed with Time Gyre will remove the Time Gyre effect from the target.

String.name: Cascade of Stuns I
String.tooltip: Slash a target in front of you. If you hit a stunned target, the stun spreads to nearby enemies.

String.name: Sequential Fire I
String.tooltip:
Fire a quick, damaging arrow after casting Radiant Arrow, Penetrating Arrow, or Thunderbolt, which cancels the stagger effect from those skills. A successful hit generates 3 stacks of Focus. (Stack Focus 10 times to reduce the charging time of Penetrating Arrow and Radiant Arrow.)
$H_S_GOODPvP:$COLOR_END Deals reduced damage at max distance.

String.name: Arun's Tears
String.tooltip: Gather Arunic power to create a mote that instantly replenishes MP by 20%. Charge up the mote's range by holding down the skill button, then shoot the mote up to 18m by releasing the button.

String.name: Command: Self-Destruct
String.tooltip: Order your summoned constructs to detonate, damaging and stunning enemies within 4m. You must be within 40m of a construct to issue this command, and can do so even if knocked down or using another skill.

String.name: Iron Will I
String.tooltip: Your iron will absorbs $value damage, consuming 1 MP for every 20 damage absorbed. Effect ends when you absorb damage beyond the limit, when you run out of MP, or after $time.

String.name: Kaia's Shield I
String.tooltip: Cast a barrier that absorbs $value damage on up to 5 group members including yourself within $maxDistance for $time. Immune to knockdown and stagger while barrier is up. Effect ends when it reaches damage limit.

String.name: Burning Breath I
String.tooltip: Shoot a fiery blaze that inflicts $value damage every $tickInterval for $time for up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance. Deals less damage to other players. Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on targets, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot at all targets.

String.tooltip: Rush $maxDistance and make a lethal thrust to your target's back. The target is stunned for a short period of time.

String.name: Stunning Trap Arrow I
String.tooltip: Launch a trap 15m in front of you. The trap lasts for 10 seconds or until triggered. Briefly stuns the target and surrounding enemies.

String.name: Metamorphic Smite I
String.tooltip: Damage targets within 5 meters, and has a chance to knock them down. Activates faster if used after Metamorphic Blast.

String.name: Command: Stay/Follow
String.tooltip: Order your HB construct to stay in place or to begin following you again. The HB will automatically teleport to your side if you move more than 60m away.

String.name: Master's Leash I
String.tooltip: Throw another hook to pull the target nearer. You can use this skill only after using Leash.

String.name: Blessing of Balder I
String.tooltip: You and up to $maxCount group members within $maxDistance receive a blessing that increases Endurance by 6, and recovers 55 HP every 2 seconds for $time (modified by your heal bonus).

String.name: Measured Slice I
String.tooltip: Gather your might and make a wide slice at the enemy's neck. Skill activates faster following Overhand Strike or Eviscerate.

String.name: Mana Volley I
String.tooltip: Up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance lose 25% of their total MP immediately and 172 further MP every 2 seconds for 10 seconds. This only affects other players. However, hitting any target replenishes 25% of your total MP. Press the skill button once and mouseover to lock on targets, then press the skill button again to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Staggering Counter I
String.tooltip: Execute a counterattack that briefly stuns and turns your target around. You can use this skill as a counterattack only after you've been hit. Cannot be used while in Defensive Stance.

String.name: Snare I
String.tooltip:
Launch an arrow at enemies up to $maxDistance away. Press the skill button again before it reaches the max distance to detonate the arrow early, briefly slowing all surrounding enemies.
$H_S_GOODPvP:$COLOR_END Slowing effect and duration is reduced.

String.name: Evasive Smash I
String.tooltip: Interrupt a charging skill with a rolling dodge and then follow up with a rib-rattling uppercut attack. The dodge requires one press of the skill button. The smash requires another press of the skill button immediately after. The smash's damage varies based on the level of the charging skill interrupted.

String.name: Volley of Curses I
String.tooltip: Inflict a curse that does $value damage every $tickInterval for $time. Effect stacks up to three times. Does less damage to other players. Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on to 4 targets within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again or left-click to curse all targets.

String.name: Chained Leash
String.tooltip: Throw a chain around a target within 15m and pull up to 6 enemies within 15m together into a tight group. Chained Leash stuns the target.

String.name: Eviscerate
String.tooltip: Deals powerful damage and knocks the opponent down. This skill activates faster when following Overhand Strike, Whirlwind, Knockdown Strike, Leaping Strike, Stunning Backhand, Heart Thrust, Startling Kick, or the fourth consecutive hit with Combo Attack.

String.name: Burst of Celerity
String.tooltip: Your Attack Speed increases by $value for $time.

String.name: Smoke Aggressor I
String.tooltip: Sacrifice 20% of your HP to summon a spirit for 20 seconds. The spirit retains your aggro level, and absorbs 50% of damage dealt by monsters, up to 15 times the HP you sacrificed.$BR$H_S_GOOD[PvP]$COLOR_ENDSpirit absorbs 20% of damage dealt by enemy players.

String.name: Evasive Smash I
String.tooltip: Interrupt a charging skill with a rolling dodge and then follow up with a rib-rattling uppercut attack. The dodge requires one press of the skill button. The smash requires another press of the skill button immediately after. The smash's damage varies based on the level of the charging skill interrupted.

String.name: Volley of Curses I
String.tooltip: Inflict a curse that does $value damage every $tickInterval for $time. Effect stacks up to three times. Does less damage to other players. Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on to 4 targets within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again or left-click to curse all targets.

String.name: Snare II
String.tooltip:
Launch an arrow at enemies up to $maxDistance away. Press the skill button again before it reaches the max distance to detonate the arrow early, briefly slowing all surrounding enemies.
$H_S_GOODPvP:$COLOR_END Slowing effect and duration is reduced.

String.name: Incendiary Trap Arrow I
String.tooltip: Launch a trap 15m in front of you. The trap lasts for 10 seconds or until triggered. Inflicts explosion damage on the target and surrounding enemies.

String.name: Raze
String.tooltip: Knocks down monsters around you while moving forward. Enemy players are staggered. This skill chains off of Combo Attack. $BR$H_S_BAD[Intimidation]$COLOR_END Increased aggro gain. Activates faster following Axe Counter or Punishing Strike.

String.name: Thrall of Protection I
String.tooltip: Summon a Thrall of Protection that uses melee attacks to draw aggro from monsters and defend the summoner. Lasts 10 minutes or until death. Summoning a Thrall of Life will cancel Thrall of Protection.

String.name: Wallop I
String.tooltip: Jump forward and hammer the ground with your shield to inflict damage with a chance of knockdown. Blocks attacks from the front. Activates faster if you first use Charging Lunge, Shield Barrage, Debilitate, Shield Counter, or Spring Attack.

String.name: Retaliate I
String.tooltip: Leap to your feet while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked-down. You become briefly immune to knockdown, stagger, and stuns.

String.name: Ultimate Overhand Strike I
String.tooltip: Even stronger Overhand Strike.

String.name: Time Gyre I
String.tooltip: Briefly immobilize up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance. Prevents other players from using evasion and movement skills. Knockdown or an attack on a target ends the effect. Click the skill button once and mouse over to lock on targets, then click the skill button again to shoot at all targets. Using this skill on a target cursed with Nerve Exhaustion will remove the Nerve Exhaustion effect from the target.

String.name: Command: Attack
String.tooltip: Aim at a target within $maxDistance and press the skill button to command your Smoke Aggressor to attack that target.

String.name: Tackle
String.tooltip: Spin your axe to hurl a bolt that knocks down an enemy up to 18m away.

String.name: Backstep
String.tooltip: Quickly back up without turning around.

String.name: Fiery Escape I
String.tooltip: Damage targets in front of you, briefly decreasing their Movement Speed by $value, then fly backward.

String.name: Teleport Jaunt
String.tooltip: Teleport a short distance in the direction the camera faces.

String.name: Command: Follow
String.tooltip: Command your Smoke Aggressor to follow you.

String.name: Unbreakable
String.tooltip: Fueled by rage, your HP won't go below 1 for $time. You can still die if you receive a single blow that exceeds your max HP.

String.name: Thrall of Life I
String.tooltip: Summon a Thrall of Life that periodically heals you and removes harmful effects. Lasts 10 seconds. Summoning a Thrall of Protection will cancel Thrall of Life.

String.name: Rallying Cry
String.tooltip: Your defiant shout draws aggro while you and party members within $maxDistance become immune to knockdown and stagger for $time. Shares the same cooldown with Guardian Shout.

String.name: Final Reprisal I
String.tooltip: Release energy from your staff that damages enemies within $maxDistance. Activates faster if you first use Metamorphic Blast, Shocking Implosion, Triple Nemesis, or Zenobia's Vortex.

String.name: Hail Storm I
String.tooltip: Summon an icy storm 12m in front of you for 10 seconds damaging all targets in 6m radius. Slows targets by $value per hit. Effect stacks up to four times.

String.tooltip: Jump to target and slow target by $value with a slash. You take only half damage while using skill.

String.name: Eagle's Eye I
String.tooltip: Increase Power by 30, Attack Speed by 4 and Endurance by 4. Increases damage to monsters by 10%. Cannot be used in conjunction with Sniper's Eye.

String.name: Intimidation
String.tooltip: Continuously gain aggro from monsters within 8m. Attack skills have increased aggro gain, and the cooldowns for Raze, Flatten, and Fiery Rage are decreased. Reduces Crit Factor and PvP Attack by 18, and disables charging skills other than Thunder Strike and Vampiric Blow. Grants MP replenishment. You are immune to push-back from monsters, except for certain special attacks.

String.name: Sonorous Dreams I
String.tooltip: Put target briefly to sleep. Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on up to $maxCount target within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again or left-click to cast at your target.

String.name: Mana Charge
String.tooltip: Hold down the skill button, then release it to replenish up to 32% of max MP to you and your group members. The longer you hold down the button, the more MP will be restored. You can move while charging up the skill.

String.name: Stone Skin
String.tooltip: Encases your body in stone for 5 seconds, protecting you from all attacks and dropping all aggro. pressing the skill button a second time cancels the effect.

String.name: Traverse Cut I
String.tooltip: Makes 3 quick lunges to the front. Activates faster and attacks up to 13 times if you first use Pounce, Combative Strike or Poison Blade. Increases your Attack Speed by 0.9% per each successful hit, and the effect stacks.

String.name: Thunderbolt
String.tooltip: Shoot a concussion arrow up to $maxDistance away. The shock will cause damage and knock enemies back. It cannot knock back bosses or elite monsters.

String.name: Evasive Roll
String.tooltip: Dodge your enemy's attack. Shares a cooldown with Evasive Smash.

String.name: Regression I
String.tooltip: End all beneficial effects on enemy targets within a $maxDistance radius of you.

String.name: Triple Nemesis I
String.tooltip:
Throw energy pulses at a target up to $maxDistance away. Holding or repeatedly pressing the skill button generates up to three pulses.
$H_S_GOODPVP:$COLOR_END Reduced damage at max distance.

String.name: Blade Draw I
String.tooltip: Stab and slash your target as you draw your weapon from the wound. Activates faster if used after Traverse Cut, Vortex Slash, Charging Slash or Rising Fury.

String.tooltip: Stab and slash your target as you draw your weapon from the wound. Activates faster if used after Traverse Cut, Vortex Slash, Charging Slash or Rising Fury.
