String.name: Axe Counter
String.tooltip: $H_S_BAD[Intimidation]$COLOR_END Deliver a crushing counterattack after a successful Axe Block. Increases resistance to knockdown and stagger, and any damage taken while attacking is reduced by 50%. Can only be used while Intimidation is active.

String.name: Curse of Exhaustion I
String.tooltip: Curse your enemies with 20% increased cooldown times for all skills they use in the next 6 seconds. Effective only on other players. Press the skill button once and mouseover to lock on up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again to curse all targets.

String.name: Plague of Exhaustion I
String.tooltip: Call up a plague that immediately removes all beneficial effects and inflicts $value damage every $tickInterval for $time on up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance. Against other players, the damage decreases, but their cooldown time increases by 50% for some of their skills. Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on targets, then press the skill button again or left-click to plague all targets.

String.name: Nova
String.tooltip: Unleash a massive explosion 7m in front of you, which deals huge damage to enemies within 6m and with a chance of knockdown. You take only half damage while using this skill, and have a high resistance to knockdown and stagger.

String.name: Scythe I
String.tooltip: Deliver a deadly sweeping arc, attacking multiple enemies. Scythe exploits Edge generated by warrior skills to do more damage. Activates faster if used after Rain of Blows, Poison Blade, Blade Draw, Evasive Roll, or Leaping Strike.

String.name: Tenacity
String.tooltip: Call on inner reserves to instantly replenish $mpDiff MP. Briefly increases resistance to stun immensely.

String.name: Overwhelm
String.tooltip: Charge up to 18m and attack your enemy. Attack has a high chance of knockdown against monsters.

String.name: Curse of Confusion
String.tooltip: Curse foes so they tremble and flee briefly. Knockdown cancels the effect on monsters. Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again or left-click to curse all targets.

String.name: Guardian Sanctuary I
String.tooltip: Reduces ranged damage taken by $value2 for $time, while increasing weakening and DOT resistances by $value and greatly increasing stun resistance.

String.name: Warp Barrier
String.tooltip: Cancel all damage for $time and recover 5% of maximum MP. Mana Boost II does not apply while Warp Barrier is active.

String.name: Reaping Slash I
String.tooltip: Chop with both blades to briefly stun monsters. In PvP, the skill knocks down enemy players. Activates faster if used after Combative Strike or Rain of Blows.

String.name: Find Weakness I
String.tooltip: While active, your next attack is considered to be an attack from the rear, regardless of your relative position. Effect lasts 8 seconds, or until you hit a target.

String.name: Punishing Strike
String.tooltip: $H_S_BAD[Intimidation]$COLOR_END Perform a quick strike that generates high aggro. Press the skill button again to dash forward and attack a second time, decreasing the target's Endurance. Can only be used while Intimidation is active.

String.name: Mire I
String.tooltip: Movement Speed of targets decreases by $value, but their Balance Factor increases by $value2. Effect ends when the target suffers significant damage or knockdown. Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again or left-click to slow all targets.

String.name: Divine Respite I
String.tooltip: Recover 1.8% of your total HP every $tickInterval for $time (modified by your heal bonus).

String.name: Cross Parry
String.tooltip: Block frontal attacks with your crossed swords. Damage blocked depends on your weapon's stats. Lasts as long as the skill button is held down. Allies behind you also get reduced damage. Can only be used while in Defensive Stance.

String.name: Mire I
String.tooltip: Movement Speed of targets decreases by $value, but their Balance Factor increases by $value2. Effect ends when the target suffers significant damage or knockdown. Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again or left-click to slow all targets.

String.name: Divine Respite II
String.tooltip: Recover 2% of your total HP every $tickInterval for $time (modified by your heal bonus).

Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again or left-click to slow all targets.

String.name: Chase I
String.tooltip: Charge forward up to 16 m.

String.name: Thrall of Vengeance I
String.tooltip: Summon a Thrall of Vengeance that attacks your enemies at range. Lasts 60 seconds or until death. Summoning a Thrall of Wrath will cancel Thrall of Vengeance.

String.name: Ishara's Lullaby I
String.tooltip: Put target briefly to sleep. Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on up to $maxCount target within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again or left-click to cast at your target.

String.name: Smoke Flanker I
String.tooltip: Summon a shadow to your position, teleport behind your enemy, and attack it. Briefly stuns your target. Aggro transfers to your shadow upon summoning. Use after a successful Cross Parry on a target within a range of $maxDistance.

String.name: Thrall of Vengeance II
String.tooltip: Summon a Thrall of Vengeance that attacks your enemies at range. Lasts 60 seconds or until death. Summoning a Thrall of Wrath will cancel Thrall of Vengeance.

String.name: Thrall of Wrath I

String.name: Restorative Burst I

String.name: Mana Boost I
String.tooltip: Increases Attack Speed by 20% for 15 seconds, and skill damage by 10% when attacking monsters.

String.name: Binding Sword
String.tooltip: Throw your sword to snare up to 4 enemies within 21m and draw them towards you. You may not draw bosses or elite monsters.

String.name: Command: Attack
String.tooltip: Aim at a target within $maxDistance and press the skill button to command your summoned creature to attack that target.

String.name: Energy Stars I
String.tooltip: Fires an energy bolt at a target within $maxDistance. The bolt damages the target while increasing the Power of group members within approximately 35 meters by 20 and Attack Speed by 8 for 20 seconds. Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on target, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot.

String.name: Infuriate I
String.tooltip: Enrages all monsters within $maxDistance and increases your aggro to the maximum amount. Only usable while in Defensive Stance. After using Infuriate, you cannot deactivate Defensive Stance for 3 minutes.

String.name: Command: Follow

String.name: Epiphany of the Goddess I
String.tooltip: TEST — Priest Skill 1 (T4+)

String.name: Rain of Blows XI
String.tooltip: Execute a flurry of sword swings while advancing on your foe. You take 30% less damage while using this skill, and are more resistant to knockdown and stagger. Activates faster if used after Combative Strike, Pounce or Cascade of Stuns.

String.name: Warding Totem I
String.tooltip: Summons a totem 10m in front of you which casts a warding effect on allies within 20m and recovers 1695 HP every 2 seconds. The totem lasts for 10 seconds.

String.name: Healing Immersion I
String.tooltip: Lock on a target within 19m and fire a healing light to restore HP by $hpDiff (modified by your heal bonus) to all party members within 7m of the locked target. Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on the target, then press the skill button again or left-click to heal all targets.

String.name: Blade Draw VII
String.tooltip: Stab and slash your target as you draw your weapon from the wound. Activates faster if used after Traverse Cut, Vortex Slash, Charging Slash, Cross Parry, or Rising Fury.

String.name: Healing Immersion I
String.tooltip: Lock on a target within 19m and fire a healing light to restore HP by $hpDiff (modified by your heal bonus) to all party members within 7m of the locked target. Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on the target, then press the skill button again or left-click to heal all targets.

String.name: Numbing Totem
String.tooltip: Summon a totem 10m in front of you which decreases the Attack speed of enemies within 15m. The totem lasts for 60 seconds.

String.name: Backstep
String.tooltip: Quickly back up out of harm's way.

String.name: Scythe II
String.tooltip: Deliver a deadly sweeping arc, attacking multiple enemies. Scythe exploits Edge generated by warrior skills to do more damage. Activates faster if used after Rain of Blows, Poison Blade, Blade Draw, Evasive Roll, or Leaping Strike.

String.name: Scythe II
String.tooltip: Deliver a deadly sweeping arc, attacking multiple enemies. Scythe exploits Edge generated by warrior skills to do more damage. Activates faster if used after Rain of Blows, Poison Blade, Blade Draw, Evasive Roll, or Leaping Strike.

String.name: Speed Totem
String.tooltip: Summon a totem 10m in front of you which increases the Attack speed of allies within 7m. The totem lasts for 60 seconds.

String.name: Grace of Resurrection
String.tooltip: Grants a blessing which enables the priest to resurrect immediately with 100% HP and MP. The blessing lasts for $time.

String.name: Assailing Totem
String.tooltip: Summon a totem 10m in front of you which decreases resistance to harmful effects of enemies within 15m. The totem lasts for 60 seconds.

String.name: Rolling Reload
String.tooltip: Dodge enemy attacks and eliminate the cooldown for Scattershot. Cancels all skill animations except for that of Balder's Vengeance. You are not immune to damage while rolling.

String.name: Quick Dash
String.tooltip: Dodge past your enemy's attack.

String.name: Zenobia's Vortex
String.tooltip: Unleashes a whirlwind up to 18m, dealing damage to all enemies in its path and briefly throwing them into the air, unless they are bosses or elite monsters.

String.name: Shadow Step
String.tooltip: Instantly leap forward to evade enemy attacks. You can Shadow Step twice within 4 seconds, and you can change direction between leaps.

String.name: Shadow Step
String.tooltip: Instantly leap forward to evade enemy attacks. You can Shadow Step twice within 4 seconds, and you can change direction between leaps.

String.name: Contagion
String.tooltip: Infects one target within $maxDistance with Infection. This target cannot be purified. Infected target's Endurance is reduced by 5% and they spread a disease that deals 15086 damage per second. Players take less damage and recover fewer HP. Using this skill does not automatically start combat status.

String.name: Divine Intervention
String.tooltip: Retrieves a party member within $maxDistance in front of the caster. Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on target, then press the skill button again or left-click to activate the skill. Cannot grab an ally riding a mount or beyond an obstacle.

String.name: (TEST) Jetcycle

String.name: Summon Pet: Felicity
String.tooltip: Summon a pet with special storage, emotes, and auto-gather. Felicity gathers at an enhanced speed, at the maximum gathering proficiency, and consumes 20% fewer production points for gathering.

String.name: Summon: Topthorn
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODMovement Speed 270.$COLOR_END$BRSummon a black war horse. This mount can only be ridden in Civil Unrest zones.

String.name: Summon: Tanner
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODMovement Speed 280.$COLOR_END$BRSummon a battle lion. This mount can be ridden in normal and Civil Unrest zones.

String.name: Summon : Skydancer (30days)
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODMovement Speed 280; Flight Speed 270.$COLOR_END$BR$BRSummon Skydancer, a flying mount.

String.name: Kick
String.tooltip: Kick the rolling haybale to move it around the playing area. And by "kick" we mean whack it with a ball.

String.name: Pig Pheromone
String.tooltip: Throw pheromones at a pigling from $maxDistance or less to make it follow you.

String.name: Drum Beat
String.tooltip: Aim and hit a toad drum within $maxDistance to play it.

String.name: {@RawItem:45292}
String.tooltip: Argon Repeller #1

String.name: {@RawItem:45293}
String.tooltip: Argon Repeller #2

String.name: {@RawItem:45294}
String.tooltip: Argon Repeller #3

String.name: {@RawItem:45299}
String.tooltip: Throws a plant.

String.name: Personalized Greeting
String.tooltip:
Say hello in your own unique style—tell a joke, sing a song, spout poetry (up to 40 characters in length). Recipients of your greetings get some pep to their step. <
><font color = '#80e71c'>Edit your greeting messages via the 'Change Greeting' button in the Details section of the Skills menu (K).</font>

String.name: Summon Party
String.tooltip: TERA Rewards skill: Teleport all group members within the same province to your side. You cannot teleport group members who are in other provinces.

String.name: Summon NPC: Phargo
String.tooltip: TERA Rewards skill: Summons a traveling banker for you and your party.

String.name: Elemental Fire
String.tooltip: Pushes back and burns enemies in a spray of flame.

String.name: Elemental Ice
String.tooltip: Pushes back enemies within $maxDistance. Will freeze enemies in place after 10 seconds.

String.name: Elemental Muck
String.tooltip: Summon a circle of muck 10m in front of you. Decreases Movement Speed and drains HP of enemies.

String.name: Elemental Blast
String.tooltip: Fires a bolt of damaging energy up to $maxDistance.

String.name: Darkan's Wings
String.tooltip:
[TERA Rewards Exclusive] Summon a pair of draconic wings to impress friends and foes alike.
Skill is canceled upon entering combat. Darkan's Wings do not grant the ability to fly.

String.name: Mutate (Balder's Gift)
String.tooltip: Turns a target within $maxDistance into a warthog that will fight for you. A temporary skill given to you from the clerics of Balder to battle the Banquet of Blood.

String.name: Stun (Balder's Gift)
String.tooltip: Stuns targets within $maxDistance temporarily. A temporary skill given to you from the clerics of Balder to battle the Banquet of Blood.

String.name: Fear (Balder's Gift)
String.tooltip: Frightens targets within $maxDistance. A temporary skill given to you from the clerics of Balder to battle the Banquet of Blood.

String.name: Light (Balder's Gift)
String.tooltip: Summons Balder's lamp $maxDistance in front of you. Balder's lamp kills monsters within 8m. A temporary skill given to you from the clerics of Balder to battle the Banquet of Blood.

String.name: Punish (Balder's Gift)
String.tooltip: Inflicts great damage on a target within $maxDistance. A temporary skill given to you from the clerics of Balder to battle the Banquet of Blood.

String.name: Quake (Balder's Gift)
String.tooltip: Knocks down targets within $maxDistance. A temporary skill given to you from the clerics of Balder to battle the Banquet of Blood.

String.name: Repel
String.tooltip: Project a cone of oneiric energy that pushes nearby enemies $maxDistance away.

String.name: Inexorable Pull
String.tooltip: Drags all the enemies within $maxDistance toward you.

String.name: Human Cannonball
String.tooltip: Get engulfed in flame and fly 13m straight ahead and knocks down every target in your way and cause some damage.

String.name: Rising Wind
String.tooltip: Creates a cyclone that flings all enemies within $maxDistance up in the air.

String.name: Oneiric Lance
String.tooltip: Hold down the skill button to deal damage to all targets in the path of the effect.

String.name: Dream Bolt
String.tooltip: Project a blast of oneiric energy at an enemy up to $maxDistance away.

String.name: Hush!
String.tooltip:
You cannot use any skills or items during the event!
Thank you for your cooperation! -Popori Club-

String.name: Rampage I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#ff0030'>Rage Skill</font>$BR Rush the enemy from up to 24m away and deliver a series of devastating blows.$BRProvides excellent defense, knocks monsters into the air (does not affect other players), and increases your Rage.

String.name: Snow Barrage
String.tooltip: Hold and charge the skill button to prepare and throw a number of snowballs with increasing damage.

String.name: Set Us Up, Da Bomb
String.tooltip: Blow yourself up, dealing damage to objects and enemies around you.

String.name: Summon Pet: Candyspinner
String.tooltip: Summon your pet with the ability to [auto-loot].

String.name: Summon Pet: Felicity
String.tooltip: Summon a pet with special storage, emotes, and auto-gather. Felicity gathers at an enhanced speed, at the maximum gathering proficiency, and consumes 20% fewer production points for gathering.

String.name: Summon Pet: Wooley
String.tooltip: Summon your pet with the ability to [auto-loot].

String.name: Summon Pet: Candyspinner
String.tooltip: Summon your pet with the ability to [auto-loot].

String.name: Un-zombify
String.tooltip: Cancels zombification.

String.name: Un-zombify
String.tooltip: Cancels zombification.

String.name: Velik's Horn
String.tooltip: Teleport to Velika.

String.name: Location Scan
String.tooltip: Foes in an area around your current location are exposed to allies for a while.

String.name: Meteor
String.tooltip: Cast a series of balls of flame on an area within a range, damaging both allies and opponents.

String.name: Commander's Blessing
String.tooltip: Restore 2% of total MP every second for 15 seconds of up to 10 allies in an area within range.

String.name: Commander's Salvation
String.tooltip: Heal 40% of total HP of up to 10 allies at once in an area within range.

String.tooltip: Heal 40% of total HP of up to 10 allies at once in an area within range.

String.tooltip: Cast a series of balls of flame on an area within a range, damaging opponents and decreasing their Movement Speed by 50%.
